item.title: [GRA7][Web PaaS] - Foundation upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 9, 18:00 UTC  -  May 10, 01:00 UTC

Apr 27, 12:01 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/05/2022 18:00 UTC
End time : 10/05/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. However, some short interruption may be observed for a few minutes.
Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance.
But projects provisioning won't be impacted.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of the foundation for WebPaas.

End time :06/05/2022 23:59 UTC

Service improvement : Within the framework of the continuous improvement of our services, we carry out an operation of migration of the databases between GRA2 and GRA3.
The concerned clusters by this maintenance are: sql020 and eu009.
Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/7.

item.title: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
item.description:
Apr 26, 08:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
End Time : 2022/04/26 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Following this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Current status : Resolved
A patch has been deployed. The situation is back to its state prior the incident.

Apr 6, 09:30 UTC
Identified - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
Service impact : Folowing this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Ongoing actions : We have opened tickets with 2 operators to correct the problem.
Unfortunately the main protagonist Telefonica complicates things and does not respond willingly to the problems reported. We will get back to you with updates soon

item.title: [P19][Webhosting] - MX Plan
item.description:
Apr 20, 18:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/04/2022 08:10 UTC
End Time : 20/04/2022 18:20 UTC
Service impact : All mails have been delivered successfully
Current status : Resolved

Apr 20, 18:11 UTC
Update - 97% of mails have been delivered. The time left for the full delivery is 30 minutes.

Apr 20, 17:06 UTC
Update - 75% of mails have been delivered. The time left for the full delivery is 1 hour.

Apr 20, 16:12 UTC
Update - 50% of mails have been delivered. We estimate that the time left for the full delivery is 2 hours.
We'll have another update in an hour.

Apr 20, 15:16 UTC
Update - Delivery of pending emails is still ongoing. 25% of mails have been delivered.
We estimate that the full delivery will take 3 hours.

Apr 20, 13:08 UTC
Update - UPDATE: With reference to the last update from our technical team, delivery of pending emails is still ongoing.
We can confirm that no email has been lost during this incident.
we will keep you informed on the progress. We apologize for any inconvenience caused

Apr 20, 11:10 UTC
Monitoring - After the reboot of the server hosting the Filerz24, all mailbox are now available.
Email in queue since 02:00 UTC is currently in process and will be delivered in the next 3 hours
There is no loss of data.
We keep the situation under observation while we receive all emails

Apr 20, 10:34 UTC
Update - UPDATE : Disks present in the filerz have been installed on the new server.
Server is currently booting. We are monitoring the situation.
Email Services are restored for most customers.
Pending emails will be delivered once server is back in service.

Apr 20, 09:31 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are currently working on filerz24.
All mails received before 02:00 UTC are accessible. New mails after this period are stored but not delivered.
Sending email can be slowed down.
No loss of data is to be reported.
We will come back to you as soon as intervention is complete.

Apr 20, 08:10 UTC
Update - Filerz2024 is back in service.
Ongoing actions: STORAGE team is currently working on recovering filerz24 . A replacement is still on.
We will provide updates as soon as possible.

Apr 20, 06:12 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: : An intervention is still in progress on the last two servers :
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

We will provide updates as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Apr 19, 18:02 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: Only 2 servers are unreachable:
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

Apr 19, 15:36 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: Only 3 servers are unreachable:
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz529.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

Apr 19, 12:44 UTC
Identified - Ongoing actions: Our teams are still working to solve the problem.
Only 4 servers are unreachable:
filerz75.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz529.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

Apr 19, 10:41 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: : An intervention is still in progress on the following servers: filerz799.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz75.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2023.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz407.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz529.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Apr 19, 08:59 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/04/2022 08:10 UTC
Service impact : Delay to receive emails - Delivery email - Mailbox Access
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : P19
Root cause : Pump in P19 DC out of order
Scope of impact : Filerz2024 ;filerz2086 ;filerz253; filerz175 ;filerz2023 ;filerz135 ;filerz190 ;filerz2009 ;filerz725 ;filerz75; filerz529 ;filerz24 ;filerz799 ;filerz223 ;filerz407 ;filerz192
Ongoing actions : Our team are investigating, we will provide updates as soon as possible
